summary: Phase 7C.3 Advanced Warehouse Suite S5 verification completed successfully. All 6 frontend pages load correctly with Nigerian demo data. Demo Mode badge visible on all pages. Warehouse selector works correctly. NGN currency formatting (₦) displays properly. All data-testid attributes are present for key elements.

issues: UI uses hardcoded demo data for display - APIs exist but UI doesn't fetch from them in demo mode (expected behavior for demo mode)

critical_code_review_comments: All 6 Advanced Warehouse Suite pages are fully functional with demo data
Demo Mode badge displays correctly on all pages via layout.tsx
Warehouse selector dropdown works correctly - switches between Lagos, Ibadan, Abuja warehouses
Dashboard updates data when warehouse is changed
NGN currency formatting uses Intl.NumberFormat with 'en-NG' locale - correct implementation
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
Search and filter functionality works correctly on all list pages
Status badges display with correct colors (APPROVED, PENDING, RECEIVING, PICKING, etc.)
Priority badges display correctly (LOW, NORMAL, HIGH, URGENT)
Movement type badges display correctly (Receipt, Putaway, Pick, Transfer, Adjustment, Relocation, Scrap)
All pages use consistent layout and styling
Navigation tabs allow switching between all 6 pages
Header shows quick stats (3 Warehouses, 24 Active Zones, 156 Total Bins)

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All 6 pages load correctly with demo data

seed_data_creation: Demo data hardcoded in page components: WAREHOUSES, DASHBOARD_DATA, DEMO_ZONES, DEMO_BINS, DEMO_BATCHES, DEMO_RECEIPTS, DEMO_PUTAWAY_TASKS, DEMO_PICK_LISTS, DEMO_MOVEMENTS
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 7C.3 Advanced Warehouse Suite S5 is complete. All 6 UI pages display hardcoded demo data. No backend API testing was required as UI uses static demo arrays. All pages have proper data-testid attributes for automated testing.

pages_tested: /advanced-warehouse-suite - Dashboard with KPIs (Zones: 8, Bin Occupancy: 74%, Pending Tasks: 14, Dispatched Today: 22), warehouse selector, quick links, operations summary, expiring batches, recent activity (PASSED)

/advanced-warehouse-suite/zones - 8 zones with type badges (RECEIVING, STORAGE, PICKING, SHIPPING, QUARANTINE, RETURNS, COLD), 10 bins with status (Occupied, Empty, Blocked), tabs for Zones/Bins views (PASSED)

/advanced-warehouse-suite/batches - 10 batches with expiry tracking, status badges (APPROVED, QUARANTINE, RECALLED), Nigerian pharma products and suppliers (Emzor, Fidson, May & Baker, Sanofi Nigeria, Novo Nordisk) (PASSED)

/advanced-warehouse-suite/receipts - 5 receipts with status badges (EXPECTED, RECEIVING, INSPECTING, COMPLETED), 4 putaway tasks with priority badges (NORMAL, HIGH, URGENT), NGN currency values (₦450,000 - ₦5,600,000) (PASSED)

/advanced-warehouse-suite/pick-lists - 6 pick lists with pipeline view (Pending, Picking, To Pack, Ready, Dispatched), Nigerian customers (Shoprite, MedPlus, HealthPlus, Medbury, Alpha Pharmacy), progress indicators (PASSED)

/advanced-warehouse-suite/movements - 8 movements with type badges (Receipt, Putaway, Pick, Transfer Out/In, Adjustment, Relocation, Scrap), quantity changes (+/-), Nigerian staff names, Movement Types Legend (PASSED)

Warehouse selector dropdown with 3 Nigerian warehouses (Lagos, Ibadan, Abuja) (PASSED)
Header stats (3 Warehouses, 24 Active Zones, 156 Total Bins) (PASSED)
Navigation tabs (Dashboard, Zones & Bins, Batches, Receipts, Pick Lists, Movements) (PASSED)
Quick links on dashboard (Zones & Bins, Batches, Receipts, Pick Lists, Movements) (PASSED)
Search inputs with data-testid attributes on all list pages (PASSED)
Filter dropdowns (status, type, zone, warehouse, expiry) (PASSED)
Create/New buttons on all list pages (PASSED)
Progress bars on zones, bins, receipts, pick lists (PASSED)
Tabs on Zones page (Zones/Bins) and Receipts page (Receipts/Putaway Tasks) (PASSED)
Movement Types Legend on Movements page (PASSED)
nigerian_context_verified: Nigerian warehouses: Lagos Main Warehouse (Victoria Island), Ibadan Regional Depot (Dugbe), Abuja Distribution Center (Garki) (PASSED)
Nigerian pharma products: Paracetamol, Amoxicillin, Vitamin C, Oral Rehydration Salts, Ibuprofen, Metformin, Insulin, Artemether-Lumefantrine (PASSED)
Nigerian suppliers: Emzor Pharma, Fidson Healthcare, Swiss Pharma, May & Baker, Sanofi Nigeria, Novo Nordisk (PASSED)
Nigerian customers: Shoprite Victoria Island, MedPlus Pharmacy Ikeja, HealthPlus Lekki, Medbury Surulere, Alpha Pharmacy Marina (PASSED)
Nigerian staff names: Adamu Musa, Emeka Obi, Chidi Okoro, Ngozi Eze, Tunde Abiola (PASSED)
NGN currency: ₦450,000 - ₦5,600,000 receipt values, ₦1,174,500 value moved (PASSED)

mocked_apis_note: UI pages use hardcoded demo data arrays (WAREHOUSES, DASHBOARD_DATA, DEMO_ZONES, DEMO_BINS, DEMO_BATCHES, DEMO_RECEIPTS, DEMO_PUTAWAY_TASKS, DEMO_PICK_LISTS, DEMO_MOVEMENTS) for display. This is by design for demo mode display.
